item.description: godfathers meshuggner wedding is playing, along with dinner.in conjuction with another meetup group (Terri's west hartford group).this show historically sells out quickly....you must call the box office 860-244-3311 and order your ticket 39.95 per person...give your choce of stuffed shrimp or stuffed chicken and request that you be seated at chuck quint's table..you must email me once you have made a reservation to ensure that you will be seated at my table. act quickly this will sell out in no time.
